00028 #ifndef __BLI_MEMPOOL_H__
00029 #define __BLI_MEMPOOL_H__
00030 
00037 #ifdef __cplusplus
00038 extern "C"
00039 {
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 struct BLI_mempool;
00043 struct BLI_mempool_chunk;
00044 
00045 typedef struct BLI_mempool BLI_mempool;
00046 
00047 /* allow_iter allows iteration on this mempool.  note: this requires that the
00048  * first four bytes of the elements never contain the character string
00049  * 'free'.  use with care.*/
00050 
00051 BLI_mempool *BLI_mempool_create(int esize, int totelem, int pchunk, int flag);
00052 void *BLI_mempool_alloc(BLI_mempool *pool);
00053 void *BLI_mempool_calloc(BLI_mempool *pool);
00054 void  BLI_mempool_free(BLI_mempool *pool, void *addr);
00055 void  BLI_mempool_destroy(BLI_mempool *pool);
00056 int   BLI_mempool_count(BLI_mempool *pool);
00057 void *BLI_mempool_findelem(BLI_mempool *pool, int index);
00058 
00060 /*private structure*/
00061 typedef struct BLI_mempool_iter {
00062     BLI_mempool *pool;
00063     struct BLI_mempool_chunk *curchunk;
00064     int curindex;
00065 } BLI_mempool_iter;
00066 
00067 /* flag */
00068 enum {
00069     BLI_MEMPOOL_SYSMALLOC  = (1 << 0),
00070     BLI_MEMPOOL_ALLOW_ITER = (1 << 1)
00071 };
00072 
00073 void  BLI_mempool_iternew(BLI_mempool *pool, BLI_mempool_iter *iter);
00074 void *BLI_mempool_iterstep(BLI_mempool_iter *iter);
